nodes.documentation: @title Supply Chain.
nodes.name: SupplyChain

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier used to only allow owner ***of the contract to call modfied function
nodes.name: isOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev verifies that the buyer has payed enough Ether ***to complete the transaction
nodes.name: paidEnough

nodes.documentation: @dev checks whether there is a remaining***balance to refund
nodes.name: checkValue

nodes.documentation: @dev checks to see if the item requested has ***already been sold.
nodes.name: forSale

nodes.documentation: @dev a circuit breaker to that prevents all ***app functionality if something bad occurs***if the contract is paused, modified function stops
nodes.name: checkIfPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev initializes the contract***setting the owner of the contract to be msg.sender***and initializing the id count of the items at 0

@dev adds an item to the contract storage.
param _name Name of the item
param _skuCount The identity number of the item
param _image an image address of the item
nodes.name: addItem

nodes.documentation:
@dev allows user to buy an item stored in the contract
param sku the identity number of the item
nodes.name: buyItem

nodes.documentation: @dev allows the owner of the contract to ***terminate execution of functions modified by ***a isPaused modifier
nodes.name: circuitBreaker

nodes.documentation:
@dev returns the item with the specified sku
param _sku the items identity number
return name Name of the item
return sku Id of the item
return price Price of the item
return state State of the Item (ForSale | Sold)
return seller Seller of the Item
return buyer Buyer of the item
return image Image of the item
nodes.name: fetchItem

addItem(string,uint256,string).details: adds an item to the contract storage. param _name Name of the item param _skuCount The identity number of the item param _image an image address of the item

buyItem(uint256).details: allows user to buy an item stored in the contract param sku the identity number of the item

circuitBreaker().details: allows the owner of the contract to ***terminate execution of functions modified by ***a isPaused modifier

constructor.details: initializes the contract***setting the owner of the contract to be msg.sender***and initializing the id count of the items at 0

fetchItem(uint256).details: returns the item with the specified sku param _sku the items identity number return name Name of the item return sku Id of the item return price Price of the item return state State of the Item (ForSale | Sold) return seller Seller of the Item return buyer Buyer of the item return image Image of the item
